description.content:
## News API Collection

News API: [link](https://news-api-assessment.herokuapp.com/api/posts/)

This is a collection to news api created as test assessment by Dina Iovcheva  [github:broeld/news_api](https://github.com/broeld/news_api)

News api provides CRUD functions to posts, comments, replies to comments and a few functions to users (create, update and get by id).

#### users
| endpoint          | description   |
| ----------------- |:-------------:|
| POST api/users/   | create user   |
| GET  api/users/{{user_id}}/     | get user-info (only for your user account) |
| PUT  api/users/{{user_id}}/     | update user info (only for your user account)|


#### posts
| endpoint          | description   |
| ----------------- |:-------------:|
| GET     api/posts/    | get all posts   |
| POST    api/posts/   | create post (only for users) |
| GET     api/posts/{{post_id}}/   | get post|
| PUT     api/posts/{{post_id}}/   | update post (only for author)  |
| DELETE  api/posts/{{post_id}}/   | delete post (only for author) |
| POST    api/posts/{{post_id}}/upvote   | upvote/downvote post |

#### comments

| endpoint          | description   |
| ----------------- |:-------------:|
| GET     api/posts/{{post_id}}/comments/  | get comments to post   |
| POST    api/posts/{{post_id}}/comments/  | create comment to post (only for users)  |
| GET     api/posts/{{post_id}}/comments/{{comment_id}}/   | get comment info |
| PUT     api/posts/{{post_id}}/comments/{{comment_id}}/   | update comment (only for author) |
| DELETE  api/posts/{{post_id}}/comments/{{comment_id}}/   | delete comment (only for author) |
| GET     api/posts/{{post_id}}/comments/{{comment_id}}/replies   | get replies to comment  |
| POST    api/posts/{{post_id}}/comments/{{comment_id}}/replies   | create reply to comment |
